attributes.action: To help financially Grassroots football teams during suspension of all sport
attributes.background: To Help and Support Grassroots Football clubs as many clubs relies on Subscribers to financial support their local clubs. Without this support many club may fold and the grassroots game may disappear forever.

rejection.details:
We understand that you want the Government to support grassroots football teams, but it's not clear exactly what you want the Government to do to achieve this.

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to set up a fund to support grassroots football teams during the coronavirus outbreak, or to provide additional funding to local authorities to provide this support.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
